title: Libon SMP is Starting Soon
content: Me and my online friends started a server. We are currently working on it. Me personally is working on the most important part of the server, the Server Management Tool.

title: Added Be Gone Monsters! Behaviour Pack
content: I have added my Be Gone Monsters! behaviour pack from my curseforge account.

title: Added Whisperstone Addon
content: I have added my Whisperstone addon from my curseforge account.

title: CodeZeiro's MC Labs Launched
content: CodeZeiro's MC Labs is now live on Netlify. Initial addon showcase is up and running.

title: UI Redesign
content: Switched to a boxy, Minecraft-inspired UI for better visual consistency.
